grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
kun reading compounds: 寝る【ねる】to lie down, to go to bed, to lie in bed, to sleep (lying down), to sleep (with someone, i.e. have intercourse), to lie idle
寝る子は育つ【ねるこはそだつ】sleep brings up a child well, a well-slept child is a well-kept child
寝かす【ねかす】to put to sleep, to lay (something) on its side
